mapper.select: select count(bdCno) from board WHERE bdTitle LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%');

select bdCno, bdTitle, bdContent, bdName, bdDate, bdCategory, bdValue as value from board
WHERE bdTitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE bdContent LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE bdTitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') or bdContent LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE bdName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
limit 0, 3
select bdCno, bdTitle, bdContent, bdName, bdDate, bdCategory, bdHit, bdLike, bdValue as value from board order by bdLike desc
select bdCno, bdTitle, bdContent, bdName, bdDate, bdCategory, bdHit, bdLike, bdValue as value from board order by bdDate desc
